name: Baldis Basics 2: High School
description:
If math was your horror at school, then our game is horrific twice for you! Slew of math quests awaits you in a horrific place - Baldi’s basics school. This Education and learning simulator is a horror, in which you will have to collect notes and solve math quests. Special calculator will show you mathematical tasks, which you will have to solve in your notebook. In Baldi’s basics, you can count everything in your mind. So prepare your notebook and pencil, remember everything you have learned from school and get ready to experience horror in our education and learn simulator: Baldis Basics 2: High School . Do not let mathematical equations become your own horror. Open this application and solve all of them.

In this education and learning simulator, you will play as a student in new Baldi’s basics school, who have to stroll through corridors and search for notes. These notes will give you slew math quests, which you will have to complete. Just look on screen of calculator and write answer in your notebook. Many screamers also awaits you in this education and learn simulator. New Baldi’s basics school has slew horrors inside and the only way to escape this horrific place is to solve every mathematical equation in the game. New Baldi’s basics school is a true horror, which also contains math, what makes this place twice horrific. Remember everything you had learned at school and escape this unpleasant place. Share this game with your friends and play together. Solving mathematical equations is faster, when you are not alone. If you cannot solve task, which calculator gave you, you can always ask your friends to help you.

Baldis Basics 2: High School is a free to play education and learning simulator. Solve slew mathematical equations and collect notes to earn new quests to solve. Collect every mathematical note and solve every mathematical task to escape new Baldi’s basics school, which is full of horrors. Evade screamers and hard tasks to survive and get out of this horrific place. Calculator will give you a task, just write a correct answer in your notebook, but if it is too hard for you, you can always ask your friends to help you. Download our new education and learning simulator and give your brain a nice workout from Baldi’s basics school.
